page.title: 04EDUCATION CLAUGHTON SCHOOL
page.content: CLAUGHTON IS SITUATED IN SOME OF THE PRETTIEST COUNTRYSIDE IN LANCASHIRE. OUR SCHOOL IS WELL OVER 100 YEARS OLD. RECENTLY IT HAS BEEN THREATENED WITH CLOSURE BUT EVERYONE ROUND HERE IS DOING THEIR BEST TO SEE THAT IT STAYS OPEN.MOST OF US COME TO SCHOOL BY TAXI AND KNOW WE WOULD HAVE TO TRAVEL MUCH FURTHER IF THIS SCHOOL WERE CLOSED.THE SCHOOL IS USED FOR OUR ANNUAL CHRISTMAS FAIR AND EVENTS LIKE FANCY DRESS PARTIES FOR HALLOWEEN AND OTHER SPECIAL OCCASIONS. WE FEEL THAT OUR SCHOOL IS SO POPULAR THAT WE WANT IT TO STAY OPEN FOR 200 YEARS.
